lyrics.text:
Sī! ‘Oku lea ‘a e langi ia,
‘O fakahā ‘a e nāunau’ia
‘O e ‘Otua Lāngilangi.
Hā ‘i he femamenite
‘Ulungaanga fulipē,
He poto mo e Māfimafi.

Lea fakahā ‘a e ‘aho ia
He tala fakafiefia,
Ko ‘Ela ‘oku aoniu.
Fakasi’isi’i ‘a e ngaahi pō,
Kamo ke fakahinohino,
Ko ‘Ela ‘oku Ta’eliliu.

‘Oku ‘ikai nai ongo mai
Hange ha lea ‘a ha kakai:
Fai fakalongo ‘enau ngāu
e
:
Ka ko e potu fē ‘i Maam
a
Kuo ta’e a’u ki ai ‘a e tal
a
Ko ‘Ela ia ‘oku Pul
e
.

Hangē he hā fo’ou ‘a e la’ā,
Tu’u hake he tokoto’anga,
He pongipongi fulipē;
Pehē ‘a e ‘ikai ‘autalua
‘A e ivi ‘o hotau ‘Otua,
Ko ‘Ela ‘oku Pehē ai pē,

Ka ko e tala ‘e he langi,
‘E ngata mei he ‘atamai,
‘Aonga ia ‘i taimi pē.
‘E, ko e tala haohaoa
Ko e folofola ‘a Sihova
‘Ene liliu ‘a e laumālie.
